subject: Skiing
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: The Olympian Tim Jitloff won the giant slalom at the United States Alpine championships by more than one and a half seconds when the Sochi Games gold medalist Ted Ligety failed to finish.
snippet: The Olympian Tim Jitloff won the giant slalom at the United States Alpine championships by more than one and a half seconds when the Sochi Games gold medalist Ted Ligety failed to finish.
